text: Marin Vasile-Goldberger was a male Romanian international table tennis player. He won a silver medal at the 1936 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's team event. He famously played in a match against Michel Haguenauer that lasted 7 hours 35 minutes before the match was stopped. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Romanian male table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Marin Vasile-Goldberger
